itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, June 6, 2013
contentencoded:
Uncertainty over the Federal Reserve's next move is throwing investors for a loop and unsettling markets.

Diane Swonk, chief economist at Mesirow Financial, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to explain what the "Fed Dread" is all about.
title: Fed dread unsettles markets
description: Uncertainty over the Federal Reserve's next move is throwing investors for a loop and unsettling markets. Diane Swonk, chief economist at Mesirow Financial, explains what the 'Fed Dread' is all about.
